com.reactivecascade.i

Interface ICancellable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAltFuture<IN,OUT>, IRunnableAltFuture<IN,OUT>, ISettableAltFuture<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAltFuture, AbstractAltFuture.OnCancelledAltFuture, CompoundAltFuture, OnCancelledAltFuture, OnErrorAltFuture, RunnableAltFuture, SettableAltFuture

    public interface ICancellable
    Stop an ongoing activity early if it has not already completed. Cancellation is cooperative. Long running chain steps should periodically check isCancelled() and terminate early.

    This is not an interrupt. Non-cooperative techniques are discouraged in modern async Java development as they cause complications in concurrency design that may leave internal state and external side effects undetermined.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ICancellable.State
      An internal-use interface made public to facilitate mixing in alternate implementations.
      static interface  ICancellable.StateCancelled
      This is a marker interface.
      static interface  ICancellable.StateError
      This is a marker interface.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        boolean cancel(@NonNull
               String reason)
        A plain text reason must always be provided for debugOrigin purposes. This is carried forward through whay may be non-obvious asynchronous and active chain results.

        If the operation has already completed normally, this call may be ignored. A warning may be given to help clean up redundant cancellation.

        Parameters:
        reason - for easy debugging
        Returns:
        true if the action was cancelled, otherwise this call had not effect

      • cancel

        boolean cancel(@NonNull
               ICancellable.StateError stateError)
        A reason, such as an error or manual calling of cancel(String), had trigger the transition to cancelled state upchain. This token is synchonrously passed downchain to inform all other chain step so that they clean up (alter external state such as closing resources or changing UI elements).

        The Reactive Cascade library exposes thread-safe atomic internal states for extension, default implementation replacement and transparency during debugging. Most application developers will not need to use this interface directly.

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Check if cancel(String) or a similar occurrence such as a Exception have brought the operation to a premature end.
        Returns:
        true if the action has been cancelled to bring it to an alternate termination state
